mapper.insert: insert into login_log (login_log_id, user_id, time, ip, address) values (#{loginLogId}, #{userId}, #{time}, #{ip}, #{address})

insert into login_log
login_log_id,
user_id,
time,
ip,
address,

update login_log
login_log_id = #{record.loginLogId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
time = #{record.time,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ip = #{record.ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update login_log set login_log_id = #{record.loginLogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, time = #{record.time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ip = #{record.ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update login_log
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
